title: The Best Weekend Sales, According To R29 Shopping Editors
description: As professional online shoppers, Refinery29 Most Wanted writers have a spidey sense for the best virtual sale sections and limited-time offers. Whether it's Lululemon's ol' reliable We Made Too Much sale or a flash deal on best-selling skin-care brands, where there's a clearance rack, there's an R29 shopping editor ready to size up its price-slashed goods. Today, we bring you the best sales happening this weekend. Gird your loins — err, wallets. The deals on this list must meet at least one of the following criteria: The discount is applied to a Refinery29 reader-favorite item (according to our anonymous shopping data), it takes a minimum of 20% off the full price, or it's an item that's rarely discounted, making even a slight price cut worth noting. The following sales are ones to watch and worthy of a spot in all budget-friendly carts — at least, in our opinion.All linked products are independently selected by our editors. If you purchase any of these products, we may earn a commission.For more can't-miss shopping stories delivered straight to your inbox, sign up for our Most Wanted newsletter.Labor Day IntroAs professional online shoppers, Refinery29 affiliate writers have a *spidey* sense for the best virtual sale sections and limited-time deals. Whether it's Lululemon's ol' reliable We Made Too Much sale or a flash deal on best-selling skin-care brands — where there's a clearance rack, there's an R29 shopping editor sizing up its price-slashed goods. And this weekend happens to be the Superbowl (i.e. Labor Day) for professional shoppers like ourselves. Time to gear up! While we know that you are probably inundated with sales galore on everything from clothing and beauty to home goods and mattresses, we have scanned through hundreds of sales to present to you the best sales happening this weekend, according to us.Regular intro As professional online shoppers, Refinery29 affiliate writers have a *spidey* sense for the best virtual sale sections and limited-time deals. Whether it's Lululemon's ol' reliable We Made Too Much sale or a flash deal on best-selling skin-care brands — where there's a clearance rack, there's a R29 shopping editor sizing up its price-slashed goods. And today, we present to you the best sales happening this weekend, according to us.The best sales and/or deals must meet at least one of the following criteria: The discount is applied to a Refinery29 reader-favorite item (according to our anonymous shopping data), and it either takes a minimum of 20% off the full price or it's an item that's rarely discounted, making a slightly smaller price slash still notable. TL;DR: The following sales are ones to watch and worthy of a spot in all budget-friendly carts — we mean, in our opinion.LELOLELO's luxe vibrators are up to 50% off ahead of Valentine’s Day — consider it your sign to treat yourself (or your partner). Bonus: Orders over $199 come with a free DOT Travel vibrator. LELO SILA, $, available at LELOMassimo DuttiMassimo Dutti  — Zara’s sophisticated sister brand — is a go-to for elevated everyday staples, perfect for building a winter capsule wardrobe. Right now, you can score up to 50% off on timeless essentials worth stocking up on. Massimo Dutti Nappa Leather Maxi Bag with Knot Detail, $, available at Massimo DuttiAbercrombie & FitchIn need of a winter wardrobe refresh? Abercrombie & Fitch’s President’s Day sale is here, with 15% off almost everything, from now through February 29.  We’ll be stocking up on closet staples like plush wool-blend coats, cozy knitwear, and dream-fit denim.Abercrombie & Fitch Curve Love High Rise Wide Leg Jean, $, available at Abercrombie & FitchMangoOne thing is certainly brightening up our winter blues: the Mango Winter sale, with offers up to 70% off.Mango Cotton Trench Coat With Belt, $, available at MangoLululemonLululemon nails the trifecta of softness, style, and support, which is why we’re always lurking in its We Made Too Much section. Right now, we’ve got our eye on these pants — polished enough for work and comfy enough for a lunchtime stroll.Lululemon Smooth Fit Pull-On High-Rise Pant Regular, $, available at LululemonNordstromThe Nordstrom sale isn’t over just yet. You can find discounts of up to 60% off on brands like Jenny Bird, Skims, UGG, Mulberry, and many more.Jenny Bird Hidden Heart Small Huggie Hoop Earrings, $, available at NordstromNordstrom RackNordstrom Rack always has some great deals, such as Dyson products starting at $200. Right now, you can score up to 70% off across designer clothing, shoes, and accessories.Dyson Airstrait Hair Straightener - Refurbished, $, available at Nordstom RackFree PeopleThis weekend, Free People’s winter sale is packed with goodies. We’re eyeing cozy FP Movement outerwear to make those New Year’s resolution walks a little more enticing.FP Movement Priscilla Pullover, $, available at Free PeopleBirthdate CandlesWhether you're planning your bestie’s birthday or hunting for a unique home decor find, Birthdate Candles should be on your radar — especially during the brand’s 20% off Valentine’s sale. Beyond personalized candles, they also offer birthdate pendants, books, and astrology charts.birthdate candles February 14th Birthdate Candle, $, available at birthdate candlesAnthropologieThis R29 reader-favorite retailer has a sale section packed with gems at unbeatable prices. For a limited time, take up to 40% off select clothing, accessories, homeware, and beauty products.Maeve Square-Neck Tie-Strap Midi Dress, $, available at AnthropologieBrooklinenBrooklinen’s Presidents' Day Sale is here — 25% off sitewide, plus up to 45% off bundles. The perfect excuse to upgrade your bedding. Shop now through February 17th. Brooklinen Super-Plush Turkish Cotton Bath Towel Bundle, $, available at BrooklinenCoachR29 editor-favorite brand Coach has treasures in its sale section at up to 40% off. It's definitely worth a look if you’re hunting for a shiny new bag to kick off the new season.Coach Cassie Crossbody Bag 17, $, available at CoachCozy EarthCozy Earth’s Valentine’s Day sale is here —  25% off sitewide. Time to snap up the brand’s bestselling bamboo bedding and loungewear for the coziest winter yet.Cozy Earth Bamboo Sheet Set, $, available at Cozy EarthEverlaneEverlane’s sale is a must-shop, with up to 75% off top-quality staples like workwear separates, quilted jackets, and plush knits.Everlane The Dream Trouser, $, available at EverlaneGood AmericanGood American is brightening up winter with an extra 25% off sale items, applied automatically at check out. Now’s the time to stock up on top-tier denim and more.Good American Fit For Success Jumpsuit, $, available at Good AmericanJ.CrewJ.Crew does it again: This weekend, score up to 40% off winter layers and accessories.J.Crew New Stevie Knee-High Pull-On Boots in Leather, $, available at J.CrewUlta BeautyWe’re all about saving on everyday beauty faves, and Ulta is here to help with its buy one, get one free deal on mini and travel-sized beauty faves.Tarte Travel-Size Shape Tape Concealer, $, available at UltaMadewellWe're total suckers for a Madewell deal. This weekend, score up to 70% off across hundreds of styles.Madewell The Essential Convertible Top Handle Crossbody Mini Bag, $, available at MadewellSsenseFrom Ganni to Staud, Ssense’s designer sale is offering up to 70% off our favorite brands this weekend. It’s a goldmine of luxe finds for your new-year wardrobe — like these cool, buckle-detail platform boots that we can’t stop thinking about.Ganni Brown Feminine Buckle Platform Boots, $, available at SSENSEZaraZara’s winter sale is the cure for our winter blues — with up to 80% off select items, it’s impossible to resist.Zara Leather Shoulder Bag, $, available at ZaraPatagonia Attention hikers, Patagonia is offering up to 50% off this weekend. From high-performance outerwear to cozy fleeces, it’s the moment to gear up.Patagonia Women's Synchilla Fleece Jacket, $, available at PatagoniaAwayAway is offering up to 40% off select luggage — including bestselling carry-ons and weekender duffles — this weekend only.Away The Carry-On Flex, $, available at AwayRag & Bone Rag & Bone’s winter sale is on, with up to 50% off select items. We’re eyeing the brand’s denim — vintage-inspired but with modern stretch and comfort.rag & bone Sofie Ankle Ultra Wide-Leg Jean, $, available at rag & boneEtamBring sexy back — Etam’s silk sleepwear collection is buy one, get 40% off ahead of Valentine’s Day.Etam Silk Nightdress with Lace Neckline, $, available at EtamWayfairThis weekend, Wayfair is holding its Living Room Sale: 50% off across furniture, wall art, and decor. This includes big-spend items like sofas and sectionals, coffee tables, and TV stands.AllModern Geo 84" Wide Reversible Sofa and Chaise, $, available at WayfairBest BuySave on headphones, laptops, TVs, tablets, and more at the Best Buy flash sale this weekend.Apple AirPods Max (Lightning) - Silver, $, available at Best BuyTuft & NeedleThe Tuft & Needle President’s Day sale is already here, with 20% off all mattresses.Tuft & Needle T&N Original Hybrid Mattress, $, available at Tuft & NeedleClementine SleepwearClementine Sleepwear is celebrating Valentine’s Day with 15% off when you use the code LOVELOVE — plus special deals on sleep and self-care bundles. Think pillowcases, sleep masks, robes, and scrunchies, all crafted from the brand’s signature organic mulberry silk. Shop before the deals end on February 15.Clementine Sleepwear Organic Silk Hair Bonnet, $, available at Clementine SleepwearRing ConciergeShopping for a Valentine’s Day gift or an extra-special self-treat? Ring Concierge is offering up to 30% off sitewide — including diamond jewelry, initial pendants, and dainty gold pieces — now through February 10.Ring Concierge Mini Diamond Tennis Bracelet, $, available at Ring ConciergeLeave off: sale no longer onReformationIt’s dull and gray outside — but the Reformation sale is pure sunshine. Markdowns are now 50% off, with some pieces up to 70% off. We’re already dreaming of summer with this bold, bright number.Reformation Amorette Linen Dress, $, available at ReformationLeave off: sale no longer onKate Spade OutletLooking for a hot new handbag to complete your commuter 'fit? Kate Spade Outlet’s Valentine’s Day sale section has got you, with up to 80% off select items this weekend.Kate Spade Outlet Staci Medium Tote, $, available at Kate Spade Outlet Leave off: sale no longer onLe CreusetLe Creuset fans, get excited — the brand is currently offering 50% off select cookware, bakeware, and more in its Winter Savings event.Le Creuset Traditional Oval Dutch Oven, $, available at Le CreusetLike what you see? How about some more R29 goodness, right here?Abercrombie & Fitch Sale Will Refresh Your ClosetThe Best Boxing Day Sales Totally Worth ShoppingThe Nordstrom Half-Yearly Sale Is Here
author: Esther Newman
excerpt: These are the best sales to watch and are worthy of a spot in your shopping cart, in our opinion.

html:
The deals on this list must meet at least one of the following criteria: The discount is applied to a Refinery29 reader-favorite item (according to our anonymous shopping data), it takes a minimum of 20% off the full price, or it's an item that's rarely discounted, making even a slight price cut worth noting. The following sales are ones to watch and worthy of a spot in all budget-friendly carts — at least, in our opinion.

AdvertisementADVERTISEMENT

All linked products are independently selected by our editors. If you purchase any of these products, we may earn a commission.

1 of 19

LELO

LELO's luxe vibrators are up to 50% off ahead of Valentine’s Day — consider it your sign to treat yourself (or your partner). Bonus: Orders over $199 come with a free DOT Travel vibrator.

AdvertisementADVERTISEMENT

3 of 19

Abercrombie & Fitch

In need of a winter wardrobe refresh? Abercrombie & Fitch’s President’s Day sale is here, with 15% off almost everything, from now through February 29.  We’ll be stocking up on closet staples like plush wool-blend coats, cozy knitwear, and dream-fit denim.

4 of 19

Mango

One thing is certainly brightening up our winter blues: the Mango Winter sale, with offers up to 70% off.

5 of 19

Lululemon

Lululemon nails the trifecta of softness, style, and support, which is why we’re always lurking in its We Made Too Much section. Right now, we’ve got our eye on these pants — polished enough for work and comfy enough for a lunchtime stroll.

6 of 19


Nordstrom

The Nordstrom sale isn’t over just yet. You can find discounts of up to 60% off on brands like Jenny Bird, Skims, UGG, Mulberry, and many more.

AdvertisementADVERTISEMENT

8 of 19

Free People

This weekend, Free People’s winter sale is packed with goodies. We’re eyeing cozy FP Movement outerwear to make those New Year’s resolution walks a little more enticing.

9 of 19

Birthdate Candles

Whether you're planning your bestie’s birthday or hunting for a unique home decor find, Birthdate Candles should be on your radar — especially during the brand’s 20% off Valentine’s sale. Beyond personalized candles, they also offer birthdate pendants, books, and astrology charts.

10 of 19

Anthropologie

This R29 reader-favorite retailer has a sale section packed with gems at unbeatable prices. For a limited time, take up to 40% off select clothing, accessories, homeware, and beauty products.

11 of 19

Brooklinen

Brooklinen’s Presidents' Day Sale is here — 25% off sitewide, plus up to 45% off bundles. The perfect excuse to upgrade your bedding. Shop now through February 17th.

12 of 19

Coach

R29 editor-favorite brand Coach has treasures in its sale section at up to 40% off. It's definitely worth a look if you’re hunting for a shiny new bag to kick off the new season.

AdvertisementADVERTISEMENT

13 of 19

Cozy Earth

Cozy Earth’s Valentine’s Day sale is here —  25% off sitewide. Time to snap up the brand’s bestselling bamboo bedding and loungewear for the coziest winter yet.

14 of 19

Everlane

Everlane’s sale is a must-shop, with up to 75% off top-quality staples like workwear separates, quilted jackets, and plush knits.

15 of 19

Good American

Good American is brightening up winter with an extra 25% off sale items, applied automatically at check out. Now’s the time to stock up on top-tier denim and more.

16 of 19

J.Crew

J.Crew does it again: This weekend, score up to 40% off winter layers and accessories.

17 of 19

Ulta Beauty

We’re all about saving on everyday beauty faves, and Ulta is here to help with its buy one, get one free deal on mini and travel-sized beauty faves.

18 of 19

Madewell

We're total suckers for a Madewell deal. This weekend, score up to 70% off across hundreds of styles.

19 of 19

Ssense

From Ganni to Staud, Ssense’s designer sale is offering up to 70% off our favorite brands this weekend. It’s a goldmine of luxe finds for your new-year wardrobe — like these cool, buckle-detail platform boots that we can’t stop thinking about.

AdvertisementADVERTISEMENT

AdvertisementADVERTISEMENT

AdvertisementADVERTISEMENT

AdvertisementADVERTISEMENT

AdvertisementADVERTISEMENT
